thread.title: Stephanie Lock
thread.title_full: Easy Comforts reviewed by Stephanie Lock

author: Stephanie Lock
title: Stephanie Lock
text: I have never ordered from a company and have it take almost 1 month to find out that it is now in transit. I still have yet to receive it,so I am just assuming it will come. But, this is a very slow company, so if you don't mind waiting then it will be fine.
